com.vub.model

Class CourseComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vub.model.CourseComponent

  • public class CourseComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which contains data about courses. CourseData is general data about a course, while CourseComponent is a specific part of the course (for example a "dutch: WPO" or "dutch: HOC")

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CourseComponent.CourseComponentTerm
      Enumeration that describes what term a CourseComponent should be given.
      S1: Semester one S2: Semester two S3: Both semesters S4: 2 Years: Semester one odd acjr S5: 2 Years: Semester two odd acjr S6: 2 Years: Both semesters odd acjr S7: 2 Years: Semester one even acjr S8: 2 Years: Semester two even acjr S9: 2 Years: Both semesters even acjr EX: Exam
      static class  CourseComponent.CourseComponentType
      Enumeration that describes what type a CourseComponent is.
      HOC WPO ZLF EXM
